metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2120 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: OFFIS DCMTK's (All versions prior to 3.6.7) service class user (SCU) is vulnerable to relative path traversal, allowing an attacker to write DICOM files into arbitrary directories under controlled names. This could allow remote code execution.

notes.Note: alexmurray> The patch for this CVE also includes CVE-2022-2119

criterions.comment: dcmtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
